1111100111011110 0111110111010010 1 -> sum: 0111011110110001, cout: 1
0100011000110100 1011010111110011 1 -> sum: 1111110000101000, cout: 0
0110001111011101 1000010101011110 1 -> sum: 1110100100111100, cout: 0
1111011100001100 0000101001111101 1 -> sum: 0000000110001010, cout: 1
1011111110110110 0010110111111100 1 -> sum: 1110110110110011, cout: 0
1111110000000100 1001101100101000 1 -> sum: 1001011100101101, cout: 1
